means: 使震惊，使大吃一惊astound的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: There was an astounding 20% increase in sales.
The Chairman's remarks were so astounding that the audience listened to him with bated breath.
sentence.Network_cn: 主席说的话令人吃惊,所以听众都屏息听他说.

PerfectNetExp.abs: astound 使惊骇astounding 令人惊骇的astoundment 震惊
TOEFL词频表 - 豆丁网 ... insurance 保险 astounding 令人震惊的 astonishing astute a. (人做事)机敏的,机智的.
His speech was so astounding that the audience listened with bated breath ., 他的讲话非常令人震惊 , 听众们都屏息而听.

the results of the policy of economic reform and opening since 1978 have been for everybody to see . the progress made in the decades of the 90's had been especially astounding .中国自一九七八年推行经济改革和开放政策以来，成绩是有目共睹的，而在九十年代所取得的进展，特别令人惊叹。

list.abs: with his-flying antics , court presence , astounding talent and off-court branding , Jordan was an influential force behind the NBA's growth in popularity .随着他的高超球技，球场风采，惊人的天赋和场下的品牌效应，乔丹成为了NBA在时下蓬勃发展背后具有影响力的人物。
新概念英语单词Ⅲ Lesson 19-英语听力... ... 16.ransom 赎金 18.be astounded 感到吃惊 19.withdraw (从银行)提取.
yet Markus Willeke has found a way of watercolour painting with a new task , up-to-date relevance and astounding power .然而马克斯·威勒克已经找到致力于水彩画的方式，那就是新任务、不断更新的相关性和惊人的力量。
Perhaps the facts most astounding and most real are never communicated to man ., 也许那些最惊人 , 最真实的事实从没有在人与人之间交流.

means.word_mean: 令人吃惊的,令人迷惑的

entry.tran: 令人惊骇的；令人震惊的
entry.def: If something is astounding, you are shocked or amazed that it could exist or happen.

means.word_mean: 1. bewildering or striking dumb with wonder
2. so surprisingly impressive as to stun or overwhelm;

sentences.sentence: "the amount of money required was staggering"
"the figure inside the boucle dress was stupefying"
